# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="50986-102">在 Outlook.com 中新增旗標與提醒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="50986-103">若要設定或編輯事件的提醒：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-104">移至 [行事[曆](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/)]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-105">選取您想要提醒的事件，然後選取右上角的箭號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="50986-106">加以展開。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-107">在 [**提醒我**] 旁邊，選擇提醒時間。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="50986-108">Outlook.com 會自動儲存您的變更。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="50986-109">若要提醒您自行追蹤郵件，您可以新增後續旗標：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-110">移至[郵件](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-111">在郵寄清單中，將游標移到郵件上，以查看 [旗標] 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50986-112">選取標誌圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="50986-113">以旗標郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="50986-114">若要查看所有已標記的郵件，請選取頁面左下角的核取記號以移至 [任務]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="50986-115">若要深入瞭解，請參閱[標記或在 Outlook.com 中固定郵件](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50986-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
